channel.description: what would be a rare drop wieght i've been messin around i've made dragon weps and armor some edited weps and bones drop from couple dif drags jus wanted to know what a pretty rare drop wieght would be can't seem find one don't have much time on today to be wastin time lol thx ( =

item.source: I jus need someones opinion on somthing?

item.title: I jus need someones opinion on somthing?
item.dc:creator: @Nuk Nuk
item.description:
@Nuk wrote:

That’s some messy text dude ;s
Are you trying to edit NPC’s drops so they drop dragon items rarely?
If so here’s an example:

<ItemDropDef> <id>10</id> <amount>20</amount> <weight>200</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>34</id> <amount>3</amount> <weight>80</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>35</id> <amount>3</amount> <weight>100</weight> </ItemDropDef> <ItemDropDef> <id>31</id> <amount>3</amount> <weight>150</weight> </ItemDropDef>

So you must count the total weight. In this case its '200+80+100+150=530
530 is the total weight

         <id>10</id>
        <amount>20</amount>
        <weight>200</weight>
     ^
 So coins would have 200/530 chance of dropping coins which is about 38%

Read full topic
